name: Square Mobile Backend Server
description: An example mobile backend server for Square In-App Payments

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your "Access Token" or "Personal Access Token" which can be found on your Square Application Dashboard [https://developer.squareup.com/apps/]. You can process payments by POSTing to the /chargeForCookie path with your payment nonce as the value on the nonce key for a JSON body.

ENVIRONMENT.description: For sandbox testing use "SANDBOX", for production use "PRODUCTION".
